title: Game lagging problems
body:
Am i the only one starts lagging since three days ago? I usually gets 45 ping and now its jumping around 180-240   
                         
{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Dramatic changes in your latency (ping) are generally caused by ISP routing changes to the server. If your connection is rerouted to take a longer path to the server, it can result in high latency to that server. There are some local settings that can also impact your connection to League, and the guide that *Rineyy* linked is a good starting point to resolving this.

Let me know if you still see latency issues after working through those steps.

Welcomed. :) Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!
